website_summaries.verdict: A more sophisticated, upscale flip-flop than the Tide II.
pros: Perfect for travel, resort wear, or any time you want a sandal but need something a little more dressy
Arch feels more pronounced than other Vionic styles
Received the APMA Seal of Acceptance
Leather upper with knot detail at vamp
Bio-mechanically designed footbed hugs arches and keeps natural alignment
cons: Manufacturer recommends ordering the nearest size down if you are a half size

customer_reviews.title: Want to love them but...
customer_reviews.text: I have had my eye on these for a year. When the price dropped on my size I ordered them (size 6.5). I got the right size but something is clearly wrong. Each shoe has a noticeably different colored footbed! I checked for availability of another pair and they were much cheaper than I paid the first time (65)! So, I've ordered again and hoping I can get a matching pair. I'll decide what the return will say when I see the new pair. They are very comfortable and I love them. If it all works out I will update to 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Neil E

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely awesome super cute and sexy sandals
customer_reviews.text: Hit it out of the park on these they are so cute I absolutely love them they’re light they fit great I love the champagne color highly recommend I ordered my normal size
customer_reviews.author: Nancy N.

customer_reviews.title: They are the most comfortable show I have ever worn
customer_reviews.text: Vionic's run big. I wear a size 8-1/2 to a 9. In Vionic's I wear a size 8. They are the most comfortable show I have ever worn! It's like having orthotics already built into the shoe! They have sandals, sneakers, shoes, booties, etc!! Great for Plantarfasciitis I've had for ten years but these Vionic's give me much more time on my feet!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love them...very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have lots of pairs of Vionic...these live up to the standard. As with all their sandals, I size down a half-size--got these in a 10 (I am a true 10.5), and they are perfect. Love the metallic rose gold color; attractive but still wearable both casually and for a more dressy occasion. Arch support feels great. I like the more substantial leather straps--feels more secure. I was a little worried, because I have big feet, that they might look a little awkward with the wider straps, but they don't--I like the look on my foot. Also like how far toward the back of the footbed the straps are secured--they feel sturdy and comfortable--no slipping.
customer_reviews.author: prudence

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't really fit like it's particularly healthy for my feet
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't really fit like it's particularly healthy for my feet. Too heavy and takes some strain to lift. Looks good and not too uncomfortable, plus my feet immediately made a dirt impression on the footbed so I didn't return it. Really did not feel it was worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Q. Shang

customer_reviews.title: These are super comfortable with soft material all around
customer_reviews.text: These are super comfortable with soft material all around. They were scuffed and a bit dirty around edges and on top by toe area, which is why I didn't give 5 stars. For the price, I want a brand new pair. One was stretched out more than the other, so the left foot is looser than the right. Vionics all fit wide on a normal foot width, but these were from wear, since it was only one foot. They were comfortable enough that I kept them though.
customer_reviews.author: Kara C.

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes but they have stretched out so much after just two months that I can no longer wear them. I would like a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Palomita Chula Vista

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Vionic brand was recommended to me years ago by my podiatrist. I overpronate. I LOVE these sandals! I feel like I'm walking on air. They are much more cushiony than my previous Vionic flip flops I had that my dog chewed. I have Vionic house slippers and tennis shoes as well. I have to look at my feet when I get in the car to make sure I have my actual sandals on and not my house slippers because they feel that good.
customer_reviews.author: Alisa S

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and cute
customer_reviews.text: Love these! They fit great and are super comfortable while being cute. My 3rd pair of Vionic. Admittedly, I still miss the original structure and designs that they had in the beginning before being bought..but still a great shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Delsia

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable sandal
customer_reviews.text: Age: 60; 5'3 and about 200lbs. I have high arches, high insteps, moderate (inherited) bunions, and a wide toe span. It is a nightmare to find comfortable, attractive shoe wear. I love Vionics. This design and structure is right for me. However! I have learned to try on at my local store before ordering - since the sandals tend to be far more roomy than the shoes (not surprisingly). If Amazon has a better price (and Vionics are VERY pricey) I order online. Sometimes the local store has sales and coupons which are competitive, but either way - it's a good idea to try before you buy, as there is size/fit variation from one Vionics shoe model to another.
customer_reviews.author: M. Dinel

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable sandal
customer_reviews.text: These Vionic sandals are absolutely beautiful; however, the knot and straps rubbed directly on my bunion causing a great deal of discomfort. I was so disappointed. I own multiple pairs of Vionic sandals and they always fit true to form & are comfortable. If you have bunions, beware that the strap and knot will rub against the bunions.
customer_reviews.author: Bonkay

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: Edit: I have had these for about 6 weeks. The leather on the know has started to peel. While they are comfortable they now look like crap. I have worn them maybe 10 times and then only for a few hours at a time. No reason for them to peel. My feet don't hurt! First time in a long time. I went 1/2 size smaller than usual, and the fit is perfect. .
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Brock

customer_reviews.title: Larger than indicated size
customer_reviews.text: The quality of these sandals is great but they are not true to size. I ordered a 7 since I normally wear a 6.5 and they were huge on me. They actually fit my daughter in law and she wears an 8.5 to 9 so I gave them to her. When I've ordered a 7 in the past they were perfect. Don't know what has happened to their sizing!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn A.

customer_reviews.title: I like these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I wear Vionic Sandals 95% of the time. I needed a slipper for summer and these fit the bill. The straps are not snug but very loose on my feet and because of this, I do not think I would wear these out of the house, but around the house they are perfect. Great slippers. Not good for sandals. The leather is very comfortable and cool and light on my feet, unlike the heavy winter slippers Vionic advertises that are definitely not made for Florida.
customer_reviews.author: alabama

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and Style
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Vionic Pippa sandals in black and champagne for a recent trip to St. Croix. I alternated between the two pair throughout our vacation and found them to be very comfortable, despite a lot of walking. They are also an attractive sandal and look good on the foot. My only complaint is the footbed gets dirty quickly, but I can live with that. I usually wear a size 9 but researched the sizing of these sandals and went with the size 8.5 The fit was spot on. I know I will get quite a bit of wear out of them and plan to order a spare pair in black for future summers.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Mac

customer_reviews.title: Not only comfortable but cute!
customer_reviews.text: These are my first Vionics. I am a 8 1/2 and purchased an 8 1/2 and they fit true to size. I was nervous about them looking like "orthopedic" shoes like some of their styles do when I have tried them on in the store. They do not! Going to purchase in black.
customer_reviews.author: JVel

customer_reviews.title: just okay for vionic
customer_reviews.text: My review of them is a little unfair because it's winter and I can't really wear them yet, but I did wear them around the house and they seem a little floppy and loose. I'm hoping this will change with wearing them outside and walking in them a bit more............
customer_reviews.author: nanday

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable.  A tad wider than expected
customer_reviews.text: My podiatrist recommended this brand for my post stress fracture feet. These are great quality, very comfortable and keep my feet happy after a full day of walking. I have narrow feet, but I felt these were a tad wider than average sandals. They still function great and its not a deal breaker but something to consider
customer_reviews.author: Katy Mavour

customer_reviews.title: Love the support
customer_reviews.text: I love the feel of these shoes. They are my go to when my feet are aching. Two years ago I bought the white pair and the rose gold color. I saw these on Amazon at a sale price and I ordered the black. The thick leather straps don't cut into your foot and the toe post is very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Osteen

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Comfortable, very casual, great for everyday wear.
customer_reviews.text: Probably not as "dressy" as I expected, but crazy comfortable! Size runs true to Vionic sizing, which is usually a little large in sandals with "rubber" type bottom, and a little small in anything with heels or a solid bottom. These are great!
customer_reviews.author: Supergram

customer_reviews.title: Another great sandal
customer_reviews.text: I now own these sandals in black and pink gold. They are my favs. I have at least 20 pairs of Vionic sandals. I don't buy anything else. I even have the bedroom slides as well. I highly recommend all of them, but this particular shoe is an exceptional fit -- super soft and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: S.C.Mema

customer_reviews.title: The footbed is still very comfortable, but they are now loose on my feet
customer_reviews.text: After a month of wear, the leather has stretched. The footbed is still very comfortable, but they are now loose on my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Renee B

customer_reviews.title: Love Vionic!!
customer_reviews.text: I developed Plantar Fasciitis in my right foot. My daughter said her doctor told her about Vionic shoes as she had the same problem. I am very pleased. Will eventually replace all my shoes with Vionic brand. A little expensive but better than paying doctor bills.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 3 months...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shoe in May and it broke in July. It was comfy while it lasted by I am disappointed in the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Not Happy
customer_reviews.text: I own multiples pairs of Vionics - not happy with this pair. Arch support doesn't feel like the others and the overall fit isn't the same. Gave them to Goodwill. Not sure if they are knock off's, but they aren't like my other Vionics.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy but a little wide!
customer_reviews.text: Cute shoe but fits a little too wide! The support is phenomenal! I suffer with plantar fasciitis and these shoes are amazingly comfortable! I only wish they were a little bit narrower😔
customer_reviews.author: Elina

customer_reviews.title: Great sandal Runs slightly small.
customer_reviews.text: These were great, super comfy and great arch support but they run slightly small and narrow. I am between both ways width and size. If I would have ordered 1/2 size bigger and the wide they would have been perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Tiny bit too big.
customer_reviews.text: They are about half a size bigger than I expected. I would probably order a half size smaller than my usual size next time. But they have good arch support and I will use them for around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Collins

customer_reviews.title: returning
customer_reviews.text: The shoes were much too large and I am returning them. I am only reviewing because I want to try to end the endless emails asking me to. I don't think I will ever try to buy shoes from Amazon again for this reason.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable for my achy feet
customer_reviews.text: I do love these shoes. I have feet issues, so I love the support. I feel like maybe the straps have stretched some. They seem a little more "loose" after wearing them over the Summer.
customer_reviews.author: Melyndia A Davis

customer_reviews.title: Top too loose for heavy sole
customer_reviews.text: I love vionic and own several of their flip flops. They are wonderful for their arch support and are good quality. These, in my opinion, were too loose for the heavy sole. I felt like I was dragging the sole around. Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Renaissance Girl

customer_reviews.title: Tight leather
customer_reviews.text: I wear Vionic a lot. This shoe is tight across the top of the toes. I’m hoping with time the white upper leather will stretch, just a little.
customer_reviews.author: BJ

customer_reviews.title: Vionic Sandals
customer_reviews.text: I wear between 8-1/2 and 9 always. Bought the 9 and it fits as expected. A little extra support than normal flip flops. Walked around for 1/2 day in them and felt great. Recommend them if your feet need that TLC to get through the day.
customer_reviews.author: ConnieABQ

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love these sandals! I had the black ones and I wore them so much I wore them out. The gold was in a great price so I ordered for vacation and they were fabulous as expected. I get lots of compliments on these sandals often.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Lagace

customer_reviews.title: What’s not to like?
customer_reviews.text: These vionic flips are very comfortable. The arch support is deep and supportive. Leather straps are comfy. Toe knot is very cute and adds no discomfort whatsoever. Very expensive, but good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Missb

customer_reviews.title: These are cute but way too loose and I don't expect to stay easily on my feet
customer_reviews.text: I am a long time Vionic wearer and have many pairs. These are cute but way too loose and I don't expect to stay easily on my feet. Returned them.
customer_reviews.author: JBRACK

customer_reviews.title: Vionic sandals relieve my sciatic pain!
customer_reviews.text: Love these vionic sandals! They ease fatigue and prevent my hip and back (sciatic) pain when I'm working on my feet long periods of time.
customer_reviews.author: L.C.

customer_reviews.title: BE AWARE OF FOOTBED COVERING!!!
customer_reviews.text: Did not care for micro fiber footbed covering. It will stain quickly, easily and wear off from use and when wet. Prefer rubber footbed material for clean appearance and easy care.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey B

customer_reviews.title: Sloppy T at Toe Strap
customer_reviews.text: I had to return these as my feet moved all over inside these sandals. The T strap was too long, therefore my feet moved all over. That is dangerous to walk and drive with.
customer_reviews.author: Antoinette French Design

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable for me and look fashionable!
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of these sandals. They have been discontinued and I don’t know why. The piece between toes does not bother me at all although some people said it was stiff.
customer_reviews.author: Good customer!

customer_reviews.title: Vionic Sandals
customer_reviews.text: I RECEIVED A PAIR OF VIONIC SANDALS TODAY AND THERE WERE TOE PRINTS IN THEM. THEY WERE USED.
customer_reviews.author: Angela C.

customer_reviews.title: Love them, cute and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. They are so cute yet comfortable. My 2nd pair in this design, got the rose gold last year and paid double what these gold ones were on sale for. I didn't need them but could resist the price
customer_reviews.author: pamela sowards

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not comfy
customer_reviews.text: Don’t like them. Sending back. I buy almost exclusively vionic shoes/sandals. These didn’t fit the way the others do.
customer_reviews.author: Teri

customer_reviews.title: Vionic shoes are great for people with high arches!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes, they fit my narrow foot and they have nice high arches which helps to take the pain away from my knees. Thanks Vionic your shoes are wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Were it not for these shoes I would not be able to walk. I have a variant of plantar fasciitis and this brand of shoe was recommended by my podiatrist. They really are comfortable, and cute, too.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy S. Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Adorable sandal, but
customer_reviews.text: This sandal would be so comfortable except for the knot. It rubbing on my foot so much I could never wear these so unfortunately I had to return them
customer_reviews.author: Patricia D. Keenan

customer_reviews.title: Larger than average
customer_reviews.text: Very wide. Straps gap on my foot. I don’t have a narrow foot at whatsoever. Very pretty though so I tolerate the poor fit and only wear them when walking is minimal.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Within the first week of wearing the shoe, the knot on the sandal was ripped. Aesthetically it's not pleasing for how much I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Azinrebel

customer_reviews.title: Much wider than the typical Vionic sandal
customer_reviews.text: I love vionics but had to return these. They are too loose and the straps do not hold my foot onto the footbed.
customer_reviews.author: Buy Realtime

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Rose gold isn't really gold, but I'm used to it now...very comfortable...bf commented looked like house slippers....☹
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Benthall

customer_reviews.title: Great if you have long, narrow feet
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a 8.5 wide or 9 regular. I ordered an 8 wide. The foot bed was too long and too narrow.
customer_reviews.author: Robin B.

customer_reviews.title: Most comfy sandals ever!
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable! I could walk miles in them. I live flip flop like sandals, but they tend to lack support. These have a soft sole.
customer_reviews.author: jmonte

customer_reviews.title: Pretty metallic Rose color
customer_reviews.text: Love the metallic rose color and very comfy fit for my 7.5 M foot. Good arch support. Might be loose if you have a narrow foot.
customer_reviews.author: ShelleyD

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Loved these sandals! I’m very flat footed, with much arthritis and surgery’s to my feet! Someone suggested your brand, and I love them! First time I’ve worn “flip flop” type sandals in many years! Went larger because I wanted them looser.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemarie hill

customer_reviews.title: Love the support!
customer_reviews.text: The sandals fit very well and were wide enough for my foot which tends to be a double E. They are very cushiony and give good support . The only thing I didn’t like about them was that the knot bothers my feet somewhat but not enough to return.
customer_reviews.author: Game Lover

customer_reviews.title: very loose
customer_reviews.text: I have bought several pairs of Vionic shoes and loved them. However, this pair is not their regular quality. They are loose and side back and forth when you walk The arch support dos not stay where it should when you walk. I bought my usual size and as far as length they are perfect. I have contacted the company via e-mail with no response.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not comfy
customer_reviews.text: Only so so for comfort. Not great arch support and my feet are falling asleep while wearing. I mean several vionic sandals and really like most of them. Would not buy these again. They are cute though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love love love.
customer_reviews.text: Love. I ordered in golf and black. I'm wearing one pair or the other every day until it gets too cold. Super comfortable for lots of walking or standing. Great for travel or work.
customer_reviews.author: AJ in DC

customer_reviews.title: Too wide for my narrow foot.  My other Vionic sandals are fine (same size).
customer_reviews.text: I like the shoe, very cute. I have other Vionic shoes/sandals but this one was too wide for my narrow feet. Very disappointed but I will return it.
customer_reviews.author: Susan P.

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking for casual, beach and even flat dress up. And comfortable. Fit as expected.
customer_reviews.author: karena333

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! Perfect fit, comfortable and helps my plantar fasciitis! One of the few things I can wear without orthotics for several hours! My favorites!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect flip flops, beautiful color and design. Highly recommend and would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Loisita

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love vionic shoe. Just make sure that they are not made in China. Those are not true Vionic shoe.
customer_reviews.author: veeger

customer_reviews.title: Vionic Flip Flop
customer_reviews.text: I like the style of these, but they just did not fit correctly and were too large
customer_reviews.author: CLO6

customer_reviews.title: Hurt my toes
customer_reviews.text: I was in too much pain, had to send them back. Such a shame and not blaming the shoes. They were beautiful. I have arthritis.
customer_reviews.author: CookieKoi

customer_reviews.title: Love these sandals
customer_reviews.text: Love these sandals. They are comfortable and support my feet and they’re beautiful. Wish you had them in silver!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: these looked better online than in real life. too large looking IMO. returned.
customer_reviews.author: Mary W.

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Look great, feel great and well made
customer_reviews.author: KatieDid

customer_reviews.title: a little loose
customer_reviews.text: Pretty, but feels loose on my foot. I usually wear 6 1/2 W. I ordered 6 M. These just don’t feel as good as my other Bionics.
customer_reviews.author: pds

customer_reviews.title: Wider than normal Vionic sizing
customer_reviews.text: I love Vionics and know my normal wide width size. I returned these because they run way too wide. My foot was flopping around in this sandal. I love Vionic sandals, but this one isn’t sized correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: It’s love ❤️
customer_reviews.text: These sandals are the perfect fit. You can never go wrong with Vionics
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: These are very cute and comfortable, but way to loose for my foot
customer_reviews.text: These are very cute and comfortable, but way to loose for my foot. I have this problem with many of Vionic sandals, I wish they made more styles for narrow feet. They felt very comfortable--I was worried the knot would pinch, but it didn't at all, but I was afraid they'd fly off way to easily--Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Another great Vionic purchase
customer_reviews.text: I own MANY MANY pairs of Vionic shoes, and these are a great addition. The color is lovely, and they are very comfortable. The leather is very soft and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Gma Glitter

customer_reviews.title: Not adjustable.
customer_reviews.text: These looked great online. However, because they’re not adjustable there is no way to correct how loose they fit acrossthe foot so they flop,around uncomfortably. Should have returned them but wore them making them non returnable.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Great Sandals
customer_reviews.text: Excellent support for walking all day. I love this brand
customer_reviews.author: L. Noga

customer_reviews.title: Feet no longer hurt!
customer_reviews.text: By far my favorite shoes! I probably won’t wear any other flip flops again
customer_reviews.author: FamofFive

customer_reviews.title: Vionic Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love Vionic shoes, price was very reasonable. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: MD Hill

customer_reviews.title: Comfort with style
customer_reviews.text: Love this! It’s so pretty and very comfortable. Looking to get another pair
customer_reviews.author: stilwell

customer_reviews.title: Vionic is awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love this brand!! just as pictured , i always go a size down for vionics and it has worked again. Never had any foot pain with them at all , i recommend this brand to anyone that has ankles that turn in or PF . They will be a game changer!
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Brinkman

customer_reviews.title: Probably for a wide foot.
customer_reviews.text: I have a narrow foot and these are a little wider than expected, however, they are stylish and they work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Great support & stylish.
customer_reviews.text: Vionics are the best ! My doctor recommended them for my troubled feet. I’ve bought 5 pairs & wont wear anything else now. Stylish comfortable & good for your feet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but did not like the styling at all
customer_reviews.text: Ordered them to wear with sundresses, but did not like the styling at all. Very chunky. the leather was heavy and looked so, on my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce W.

customer_reviews.title: Not very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty but not as comfortable as my other Vionics.
customer_reviews.author: Lost in the Swamp

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shoe hopefully after knee surgery I'll be able to ...
customer_reviews.text: I gave this shoe a 5 star, even though I sent it back, not the shoe's fault, it's my crazy knee. Beautiful shoe hopefully after knee surgery I'll be able to purchase them
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and cost
customer_reviews.text: I would prefer the bed of the sandal to be black. Vionics are the most comfortable sandals I have ever worn. Only thing is they only last about one summer. They are costly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this Brand
customer_reviews.text: Great Sandler and shoes. This Company knows how to put your comfort first
customer_reviews.author: Debra A

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and support...can't ask for more than that.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to go with a dress I was wearing to my niece's outdoor wedding. They matched the dress perfectly and were so comfortable from the moment I put them on. Love Vionic!
customer_reviews.author: Amy C

customer_reviews.title: Tried on too many times.
customer_reviews.text: Left sandal fit well. Right sandal straps were so much larger and could not keep sandal on. Disappointed! Loved the color. Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Paula J. Bauer

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very uncomfortable. Knot at top dig into foot. Returned them without any trouble.
customer_reviews.author: HChaker

customer_reviews.title: Good support and stylish.
customer_reviews.text: Fits like the Tide glide with good arch and heel support. . The tie is larger than I like, but it’s a stylish shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Elise

customer_reviews.title: I had heard so many great things about the brand
customer_reviews.text: This was my first pair of Vionic. I had heard so many great things about the brand! I saw the price and that this was a leather upper. When I received the shoes I thought I was mistaken in what I remembered the description to be. The "leather" is flimsy and feels man made. The toe post is so hard it felt like my toes were bruised after wearing them around the house for awhile. I rated them 2 stars because the foot bed was super comfy. If I only wanted a foot bed this would be the shoe to get!!! Too bad the upper was so poorly crafted.
customer_reviews.author: kschmidt

customer_reviews.title: Cheap finish
customer_reviews.text: I have hardly worn these flip flops and the finish is already wearing off. They are comfortable but disappointed for the money
customer_reviews.author: Karla

customer_reviews.title: Clinic Women Rest Pippa Toepost Sandal
customer_reviews.text: I love these sandals! This it's my 4th pair of Vionic sandals. Comfortable & stylish!
customer_reviews.author: Solitaire

customer_reviews.title: Sooo sold on Vionics
customer_reviews.text: I cannot get enough of these shoes in my closet.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Condon

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and attractive - perfect combination
customer_reviews.text: Love these sandals; have purchased in two different colors. They are elegant and very comfortable. Perfect for travel /resort wear.
customer_reviews.author: Oregon Trail

customer_reviews.title: Size
customer_reviews.text: I have this sandal in a different color and same size but this one is looser;it does not fit as well. I was disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: May be less wide than other Vionics
customer_reviews.text: My 2nd pair of vionics, the 1st fit true to size and no complaints this one is a bit snug and not as wide as I would like.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbi

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Comfort
customer_reviews.text: These have great arch support and heel depth. They're lightweight and very pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Lorrie V

customer_reviews.title: Great feeling shoe but...
customer_reviews.text: This was a great feeling shoe, supportive, comfortable, but a little too "floppy" for me. I returned to try a different style.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Ivy

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and stylish
customer_reviews.text: Love Vionic’s! Haven’t worn hardly anything else since I had planters fasciitis.
customer_reviews.author: DJB

product_meta.title: Vionic Women’s Rest Pippa Toepost Sandals – Ladies Leather Knot Flip Flops with Concealed Orthotic Support
product_meta.description:
Sophisticated Style, Relaxed Comfort

The Vionic Rest Pippa Toepost Sandal is a gorgeous knot-top sandal in soft lustrous leather. A luxurious, modern upgrade to your classic flip flops, the on trend knotted leather strap and toe post hold your foot firmly in place on the comfortable microfiber orthotic footbed, and a durable rubber sole provides plenty of grip as you show of your new favorite sandals around the pool.

Everyday Support

Feet were designed to walk on soft, natural elements like soil and sand, not the hard, flat man-made surfaces that make up so much of our modern world. Vionic’s shoes and sandals are biomechanically designed to hug your arches like a natural footprint, giving you all-day orthotic support.

Engineered with a deep heel cup to enhance stability, substantial concealed biomechanical support and a firm yet flexible midsole, Vionic technology promotes comfort and stability, and it's built into every pair of Vionic sandals, slippers, active shoes and casual flats, bringing revolutionary support to the season’s most aspirational looks.

Vionic Shoes – Comfort On The Go

Vionic offers innovative biomechanical technology concealed in every style, so you can enjoy all of life’s occasions with comfort and confidence – all day, every day. With Vionic’s shoe styles, you’ll find everything from comfortable and stylish flats, traditional loafers, sleek kitten heels, fashionable wedges, cosy plush slippers, classic pumps, winter boots, lightweight sneakers and flirty summer sandals, all with podiatrist-designed orthotic support.
feature_bullets: YOUR NEW FAVORITE SANDALS: Upgrade your flip flops and slip on these gorgeous Pippa toe post sandals with orthotic support and unique leather knot design.
WHAT TO WEAR? Throw on a bikini and hit the beach or the pool, or wear these modern knot detail sandals with a floaty dress for warm summer nights to remember.
EVERYDAY SUPPORT: A podiatrist-designed footbed built into every pair of Vionic sandals, slippers, active shoes and flats promotes stability from the ground up.
DURABLE DESIGN: Featuring a leather knotted upper, the Pippa sandal is finished with a soft microfiber wrapped orthotic footbed and a durable rubber sole.
VIONIC SHOES: Vionic brings together style and science, combining innovative biomechanics with the most coveted trends.
